name: Monster House (itch) (Rzekii)
description:
Your friend was caught by The Shadow! Three of you must work together to find his head, arm, leg, and eyes so he can piece himself back together. Use your character's unique special ability to help your team gather the pieces and avoid being caught.

Characters:

Scoot (The Slime) - Scoot's job is to unlock the doors of the house for his friends and move pieces of furniture around to either block the way or gain access to objects behind the furniture.

Mike (The Mimic) - Mike's job is to distract The Shadow with his loud walking when it starts chasing his friends. When Mike get's The Shadow's attention, he must lure him away and then become one with his surroundings by turning into furniture to avoid detection. Be careful where you are when you turn into furniture though, because The Shadow can not be fooled easily.

Itch (The Teddybear) - Itch has the ability to hold all of the pieces of your friend inside his body. They can only fit in a specific way so he must collect the pieces in the right order. Itch also can hide himself stealthily for a very short time if he needs to quickly avoid getting the attention of The Shadow.

- 3 Players required

- Controllers required
